snippet.title: Misgiven - Early Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Misgiven is an emotional 2D sci-fi adventure game about the lump in your throat and how difficult it can be to say certain things.

As a space adventurer stranded in a city of masks and unbreathable fog, you come across the mask of an explorer, whose role you'll have to play to stay alive and deliver a warning no one wants to hear. But how well can you pretend to be someone else, and how far will you go?

Wrestle with your thoughts, find people you can trust and, through a uniquely tangible dialog system, experience how awkward and scary, but also how rewarding, communication can be.

Funded by Gamecity Hamburg.

🌟 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2475620/Misgiven/
🌟 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/symmetrybreakstudio/
🌟 Threads: https://www.threads.net/@symmetrybreakstudio
🌟 Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/symmetrybreak.bsky.social
🌟 Discord: https://discord.gg/RgJxqkNYqR
🌟 Twitter: https://twitter.com/SymmetryBreak
🌟 Website: https://symmetrybreak.com/
